author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1084: Fixing close button action just after adding a portlet window.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix the test suite's new repository dump function (r889342): don't terminate
the dump of a table at a "next-key" row, because that cuts off other normal
rows with keys that come after "next-key" in alphanumeric order.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/objects.py
(dump_bdb): Don't try to cut off the "next-key" row.
(SvnRepository.dump): Remove some commented-out code.

author: julianfoad
msg: Make RA-local's "obliterate" function actually do the node deletion in
between creating a replacement transaction and committing the replacement
transaction. The result is the obliteration now really happens, although
not perfectly. The immediate steps needed are: fix up the "copies" table
(see r890770's log message); fix up future references to the changed
revision.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/obliterate.c
(svn_repos__obliterate_path_rev): Do a (normal) "delete a node" on the
obliteration transaction before committing it.
